text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Su~ha~, su~ha~...
The day has finally come.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Su~ha~, su~ha~... Watch me,
this time I'll definitely take first place...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...No, I'm breathing deeply to keep from getting too excited
and having a nosebleed.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Today's race is crucial for redeeming my honor,
I must avoid a withdrawal due to a nosebleed at all costs...
choice_data_list: I see... Good luck out there!
